description:
While recently out of town, I visited the local college campus. As I walked by the dorms, I spotted a group of young muscular guys throwing a football around. After watching their hot bodies for a minute… or two, or ten… I approached Bradley. At first he was nervous because of his friends, but he took my card anyway.

Luckily for us, he called a few weeks later.

Bradley is one of those corn-fed farm boys, with the "awe shucks" attitude that I just can’t get enough of. What struck me first about him were his amazing baby blue eyes. It wasn’t until he got naked that I realized he had such a cute bubble butt.

I’m definitely hoping to have him back for more!
title: Bradley
